scripts.generate-api-client: swagger-cli bundle ./src/spec.yaml --outfile ./dist/spec.yaml --type yaml & docker run --rm -v "%cd%:/local" -v "%cd%:/tenent_client" openapitools/openapi-generator-cli generate --type-mappings=DateTime=Date -i /local/dist/spec.yaml -g typescript-axios -o /tenent_client
scripts.build-api-contract: yarn run generate-api-client && yarn run generate-api-types
